text: However, under the following circumstances we will disclose personal information to third parties (to the minimum extent necessary): 4. Where it is necessary to cooperate with national or municipal governments or public organizations or parties entrusted by national or municipal governments or public organizations in performing their legal duties, and where it is feared that obtaining prior consent might obstruct the execution of the said duties.

However, under the following circumstances we will disclose personal information to third parties (to the minimum extent necessary): 4. Where it is necessary to cooperate with national or municipal governments or public organizations or parties entrusted by national or municipal governments or public organizations in performing their legal duties, and where it is feared that obtaining prior consent might obstruct the execution of the said duties.

We share anonymized information with third parties for the following reasons: to provide the Kanamic Cloud Service and deliver customer support thereof; to improve service quality; to facilitate improvements in community public health; to promote the healthy upbringing of children in the community; to make social security less costly; and to facilitate undertakings in Scientific Nursing Care.
